TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La signification du terme `browsable` comme utilisé dans les descriptions de ce [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] est analogue à la description donnée pour , mais l’état navigable d’une propriété jointe est particulièrement utile pour les informations de propriété pour [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], car une propriété jointe est principalement un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. Cela [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] ne doit être appliquée sur l’accesseur get de définitions de propriété jointe.This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. N’appliquez pas ce [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] dans l’accesseur set.Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. Bien qu’intuitivement ce soit l’opération set qui peut être explorée pour [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] sur les éléments pertinents, il s’agit de la présence et les caractéristiques de l’accesseur get sur l’élément qui contrôle le comportement true définissant la propriété.Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. Pour obtenir des informations générales sur la déclaration des propriétés attachées, consultez [joint la vue d’ensemble des propriétés](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

param.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied..

span.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied..

summary.span: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

span.span: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le valeur ne peut être définie via la `attributeType` paramètre de la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructeur.The value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette implémentation prend en charge l’égalité des valeurs de la valeur définissable possible exposée par cet attribut, .This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, .

summary.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette implémentation prend en charge plusieurs valeurs de hachage possibles selon la valeur définissable possible exposée par cet attribut, .This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, .
